definition: Bohemia, historical country of central Europe
Poland/Polish/abbr. for 波蘭|波兰[Bo1 lan2]

sentences.english: A bit of the Bohemian rebel, a bit of the noble savage.
sentences.chinese: 帶着一點波希米亞式的反叛，還有一點貴族氣的粗暴。

sentences.english: It was dominated by the Czechs of Bohemia.
sentences.chinese: 這是由捷克波希米亞爲主。

sentences.english: Heydrich was appointed Protector of Bohemia and Moravia.
sentences.chinese: 海德里希被任命爲波希米亞和摩拉維亞的保護者。

sentences.english: How the world dynamically changes is crucial to Bohemia's plan.
sentences.chinese: 世界如何動態地改變對波希米亞的計劃是決定性。

sentences.english: Boho prints, floral patterns are all the rage in dresses and skirts.
sentences.chinese: 波希米亞印花，花朵及圖形在女裝和裙子上風行一時。

sentences.english: Bohemians also burn sugar into their absinthe to mellow its bitter anise flavour.
sentences.chinese: 波希米亞人也將糖放入苦艾酒中以減少茴香的苦味。

sentences.english: It was also presented to all those who later participated in the creation of the protectorates of Bohemia and Moravia.
sentences.chinese: 還授予後來在波希米亞和摩拉維亞建立保護國的人員。

sentences.english: Half gallery, half Boho coffee shop.
sentences.chinese: 一半畫廊，一半波希米亞式咖啡館。

sentences.english: From Bohemia the work extended to other lands.
sentences.chinese: 從波希米亞，這工作又發展到別的國家。

sentences.english: So, to recap: Bohemia likes cats, but isn't going all soppy on us.
sentences.chinese: 從波希米亞，這工作又發展到別的國家。

sentences.english: For instant bohemian, just add water.
sentences.chinese: 對於波希米亞人來說，飲用苦艾酒只需要加水。

definition: Bohemia, historical country of central Europe

pinyin: Yi1 bi3 li4 ya4 Ban4 dao3
